00016     template <unsigned D> struct NumAxes {
00017         enum { num = NumAxes<D-1>::num+D-1 };
00018     };
00020     template <> struct NumAxes<0> { enum { num = 0 }; };
00022     template <> struct NumAxes<1> { enum { num = 0 }; };
00023 
00025 
00034     template <unsigned D> class RotationAxes {
00035         public:
00041             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00042                 throw NotYetImplementedException(
00043                         "RotationAxes<"+Globals::Instance().itoa(D)+">::axis("+
00044                         Globals::Instance().itoa(which)+", "+
00045                         Globals::Instance().itoa(index)+")");
00046             }
00047         private:
00049             static unsigned _axis[2][NumAxes<D>::num];
00050     };
00051 
00053     template <> class RotationAxes<3> {
00054         public:
00055             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00056                 return _axis[which][index];
00057             }
00058         private:
00059             static const unsigned _axis[2][3];
00060     };
00061 
00063     template <> class RotationAxes<4> {
00064         public:
00065             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00066                 return _axis[which][index];
00067             }
00068         private:
00069             static const unsigned _axis[2][6];
00070     };

00077     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Rotation {
00078 
00079         public:
00081             Rotation<D, N>(): axis() { }
00082 
00084 
00086             Rotation<D, N> (N r0, ... );
00087 
00089 
00091             N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00093 
00095             N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00096 
00098 
00100             operator Matrix<D, N>() const;
00101 
00104             Rotation<D, N> &operator+= (const Rotation<D, N> &);
00105 
00107             operator bool() const { return axis.sqnorm() != 0.; }
00108 
00110             const Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> r() const { return axis; }
00111 
00112         private:
00114             Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> axis;
00115     };
00116 
00117     template <unsigned D, typename N> Rotation<D, N>::Rotation (N r0, ... ):
00118             axis() {
00119         axis[0] = r0;
00120         va_list argp;
00121         va_start (argp, r0);
00122         for (unsigned i = 1; i < NumAxes<D>::num; i++) {
00123             axis[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00124         }
00125         va_end (argp);
00126     }
00127 
00128     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00129             N &Rotation<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00130         assert(i < NumAxes<D>::num);
00131         return axis[i];
00132     }
00133 
00134     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00135             N Rotation<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00136         assert(i < NumAxes<D>::num);
00137         return axis[i];
00138     }
00139 
00140     template <unsigned D, typename N> Rotation<D, N>::operator Matrix<D, N>() const {
00141         Matrix<D, N> R;
00142         for (unsigned i = 0; i < NumAxes<D>::num; i++) {
00143             if (axis[i]) {
00144                 R *= Matrix<D, N>(RotationAxes<D>::axis(0, i), RotationAxes<D>::axis(1, i), axis[i]);
00145             }
00146         }
00147         return R;
00148     }
00149 
00150     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00151             Rotation<D, N> &Rotation<D, N>::operator +=(const Rotation<D, N>& that) {
00152         axis += that.axis;
00153         return *this;
00154     }

00162     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00163             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Rotation<D, N> &v) {
00164                 o << v.r();
00165                 return o;
00166             }
